name: Law of Synchronization
description:
Fireflies have a law where they must sync with each other and you are here to enforce it! Shoot a beam of light at the firefly in the color order of the rainbow to sync them up! Post your high score in the comments!

Order of Colors that Loop: Red, Orange, Yellow, Green, Blue, Purple. 

The bar on the bottom will tell you what color to shoot and is also the timer.

Controls:
WASD / Arrow keys -> Move
Cursor -> Aim
Click -> Shoot  

This is Kirbeast's and my jam game entry for Trijam #119 (https://itch.io/jam/trijam-119) and Kirbeast (https://itch.io/profile/kirbeast) first GameJam! The Theme was Law & Order. Fireflies have a law where they must sync with each other and the order comes from which firefly you sync up to next!

We made everything but the music, credit to Lee - Summer Night
